Summary: Walking my dog, great evening looked up and saw this very bright sliver glide then bleep from sight.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking my dog. The object was over my head, very bright....was not a plane; boomerang, almost glowing. Yes, it sounds weird but I know what I saw. I'm sure someone one else had to have seen this in the area. It was moving fast then just disapeared from sight. I just stood there looking up at the sky in disbelief.
